name: Infinite Tarot
description:
Infinite Tarot cards, for infinite futures a procedurally generated tarot deck

This game was made on the lands of the Wurundjeri, of the Kulin nation. I pay my respects to their elders past, present and emerging.

Sovereignty was never ceeded.

Learn more about its development here: https://twitter.com/i/events/1226287956790407169?s=13
